title: Board game Azul
descriptions:
Product Name: Board Game Azul

Brand: Next Move

Material: Paper

Theme: Patterns

Genre: Family

Number of Players: 2-4

Designed by the talented Michael Riesling, Board Game Azul is a family-friendly board game that will bring hours of fun and excitement to your game nights! This beautifully designed game features high-quality components, ensuring a premium gaming experience for you and your loved ones. With its Pattern theme, Azul offers a unique and engaging gameplay that will keep everyone entertained. Gather your family and friends and enjoy this fantastic game together!

*Please note that the number of players required to play Azul ranges from a minimum of 2 to a maximum of 4.
